attributes.review: this app asked for my address so i gave it thinking nothing of it. until they kept sending me refrigerators! constantly there would be more and more refrigerators at my doorstep! i tried to send them back but then they killed my cat and carved in the words “stop trying” on her ribs! DELETE THIS APP
attributes.title: DONT download

attributes.review: This app cause me to go into anaphylaxis. I started to foam at the mouth! Very bad would not do again. When I opened the app crosses in my house turned upside down. The foundation started to shake. I heard GOD tell me that if I kept the app I would be smitted. Very scary. Do not recommend. My views on trump are completely changed now. What a weird Cheeto 😫
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my boyfriends best friends cousins mom saw it and smashed my phone into pieces. If that wasn’t enough my boyfriend dumped me for the local priest. Then my best friend confessed to me that they were a vegan lesbian and had hooked up with my sister. This app ruined my life. I can’t believe I have been victimized like this!!!!!
attributes.title: Victim of a hate crime 🥺

attributes.review: So I was just making my cup noodles in the microwave when this Cheeto come up on my screen talking bout let’s build a wall we must 1 up China and there’s and I straight through my cup noodles across the room he scared me so much like this mans is my sleep paralysis demon, he just sitting in the corner of my room starring hard
attributes.title: I am mortified

attributes.review: I first try to download the app and it legit took 10 days to completely download!! So than when I finally opened the app it instantly sent my location to trump!!!!😵😮😮😮 EXCUSE ME!! Soon after I got 60 notifications within 5 minutes!!!😬😬 I just got so overwhelmed so I took my Pet skunk for a walk to cool off...... WHAT HAS AMERICA COME TO😰
attributes.title: I’m shocked!! 😳

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when I opened it my cat 🐱 saw some of the photos and she blew 💥up so I was just left white her kittenz but they were dead 💀I saw the pictures too now there zombies🧟 and I ran to my phone 📱and deleted the app and my cats 🐱were back to normal so if u don’t want zombie🧟 cats🐱 do not get this app🤧
attributes.title: My cattt😭🤡

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show respect to our president. But all it showed me was this carrot top working at the White House and oh boy I did not enjoy it! Then not even 10 min later he showed up at my place and oh was I scared and he told me to vote and I said ummm no where’s Baron I want him not you then I silly stringed him away 👋🏼💰👏🏻
attributes.title: Worst app ever 🤮

attributes.review: This app ruined my life. When you log in they ask for your phone number so they can send you updates by texts message, but they just kept sending me pictures of Donald trump eating Macdonald’s/ on the toilet/ drooling in his sleep, etc. it was absolutely terrifying.
attributes.title: Zero stars is I could

attributes.review: I got this app because i thought it would be a clean app with lots of good features and such. I first open the app and i think i threw up 🤢. The app is not good so please do not purchase under any circumstances if you value your digestive system 🗿👽. Ok thats all gbye 🤗
attributes.title: Completely awful. Do not recommend

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought it would be a good way to give my political opinions. But it gave my phone a virus and it completely shut down my entire phone. I had to spend tons of money fixing it and it deleted all my phone data. Do not download this app.
attributes.title: Virus
